OmniSupervisorConfigSkill.name: OmniSupervisorConfigSkill
OmniSupervisorConfigSkill.description: Represents the skills that are visible to the supervisors of an Omni-Channel supervisor configuration. These skills, if visible, appear in the Skills Backlog tab of Omni Supervisor.

OmniSupervisorConfigId.description: A unique identifier for the Omni-Channel supervisor configuration.

SkillId.description: A unique identifier for the skill thatâ€™s made visible to the supervisors who are assigned to the Omni-Channel supervisor configuration.

OmniSupervisorConfigSkill.accessRules: To access this object, Omni-Channel must be enabled.
